## FoundationAnalytics.trackEvent() method

Tracks an event with the specified name and payload.

**Signature:**

```typescript
trackEvent(eventName: FoundationAnalyticsEventType, payload: {}): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | [FoundationAnalyticsEventType](./foundation-comms.foundationanalyticseventtype.md) | The name of the event to track. |
|  payload | {} | The payload data for the event. |

**Returns:**

void
